api

Class SIPMessage

  • java.lang.Object
    • api.SIPMessage
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    SIPCustomerMessage, SIPStatusMessage

    public class SIPMessage
extends java.lang.Object
    Helps with the interpretation of SIP2 messages. recv:98YYYYYN60000320130424 1135112.00AOEPLMNA|AMEPLMNA|BXYYYYYYYYYYYNNYYY|ANSIPCHK|AY1AZE80C St. Albert returns recv:98YYYYNN01000320130808 1509002.00AOst|AMSt. Albert Public Library|BXYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYY|ANUnassigned|VNSIP 2.00.106 SirsiDynix Inc. 7.5.074.40|AY1AZD3FA We need to check that the values at position 2 (online status) and 56 (Patron Information) are both 'Y'
    Author:
    Andrew Nisbet

    • Method Detail

      • cleanDateTime

        public static java.lang.String cleanDateTime(java.lang.String possibleDate)
        This method accepts a possible dateField and returns a clean date.
        Parameters:
        possibleDate - example: '20131231 235900STAFF' worst case.
        Returns:
        cleaned string if date valid and parse-able as date and Protocol#DEFAULT_FIELD_VALUE otherwise.

      • isDate

        public static boolean isDate(java.lang.String possibleDate)
        Tests if a string looks like a possible date. The check is not strict - a string of 8 digits.
        Parameters:
        possibleDate - string value. To bass must be 8 single digits like '20130822'.
        Returns:
        true if the string is likely to be an ANSI date and false otherwise.

      • getCode

        public final java.lang.String getCode()
        Returns:
        String version of the initial SIP2 code.

        Returns:
